arts.ttl: FC Heidenheim vs Borussia Dortmund – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim and Borussia Dortmund go head-to-head in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. Both sides enter this encounter in contrasting form, with the hosts desperately seeking their first points of the campaign while the visitors look to build on their promising start to the 2025/26 season. arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: Schwarzgelben look for first three points on the road
arts.sum: Heidenheim host Borussia Dortmund this weekend, and the visitors are looking to capitalise on Heidenheim’s poor form to take their first three points away from home this season.
